hackathon-description-text: Join us on March 31st for Penn's premier stupid shit Hackathon. Eat free free ramen, cry and code whatever the fuck you want.
hackathon-rules:
Our rules:
- Have fun!
- No harassment of hackathon participants

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: One lucky team will have the opportunity to be locked in a cage 200ft below the surface of the Schullykill river. This team will be given five minutes to escape from the cage and swim to the surface before the sharks are released. Any survivor will be given 20,000 USD worth of beanie baby futures.

Leverage agile frameworks to provide a robust synopsis for high level overviews. Iterative approaches to corporate strategy foster collaborative thinking to further the overall value proposition. Organically grow the holistic world view of disruptive innovation via workplace diversity and empowerment.
Sometimes, it is not the strength of the tech that matters, but the heart. This hack had all the heart of a champion and none of the programming. But we still loved it.
This award is completely funded by Danny DeVito and is awarded yearly to his favorite hack.

hackathon-description-header: Eat free ramen, cry and code whatever the fuck you want.
